application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
description: APPLICATION FOR PRIOR APPROVAL IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED INSTALLATION OF A NEW 18M MONOPOLE TOWER TO SUPPORT ANTENNA, ASSOCIATED RADIO-EQUIPMENT HOUSING AND ANCILLARY DEVELOPMENT HITHERTO.
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposal, due to its siting, appearance, height and scale would be visually intrusive and inappropriately conspicuous, comprising views into and from the adjacent Open space and harmfully spoiling the setting of the Morden Road streetscene. It would also negatively impact the adjacent Wandley Valley Conservation Area and the adjacent Grade II Listed Morden Hall Park. The proposal would be contrary to Policy D8 of the London Plan 2021; Policies DM D1, DM D2, DM D4, DM D6 and DM O1 of the Merton Sites and Policies Plan 2014; Policies CS 13 and CS 14 of Merton's Core Strategy 2011; and Policy D8 of the London Plan 2021.
Reason : 2 - In the absence of a heritage statement, the proposal does not accord with chapter 16 of the NPPF 2021 and policy DM D4 of the Merton Sites and Policies Plan 2014.
